Key Match Events: Willy Adames hit a three-run home run
Spencer Steer hit a two RBI single
Amed Rosario hit a two-run home run
Justin Wilson gave up an opposite-field go-ahead home run to Jackson Chourio
Jake Bauers made a game-saving diving play against Ty France
Post-Match Reflections: The Reds have lost 37 of their last 50 games to the Brewers.
The Reds are 11-26 in one-run games.
The Reds are 19-23 against the NL Central.
The Reds are 12-49 when allowing five runs or more.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Reds dropped another one-run game.
The game was tied at four in the ninth inning.
Others: The Reds will look to avoid the four-game sweep tomorrow at 12:10 ET.
